EmailTemplate.subject: PA12-007 - Windows Server 2003
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
STAY CONNECTED <http://www.facebook.com/pages/Tritech-Software-Systems/89416081839> <http://twitter.com/tritechsoftware> <http://www.linkedin.com/companies/tritech-software-systems> <http://www.youtube.com/user/TriTechSoftware> Product Announcement PA12-007 – Windows Server 2003 POSTED: 12-05-12
Dear Clients,
The Product Announcement, PA12-07 – Windows Server 2003 <https://myvisinet.tritech.com/index.php?option=com_k2&view=item&task=download&id=888> has been posted to the Support site.
You may access this advisory via the Support site under Documentation | Product Announcements | 2012 or by clicking on the link <https://myvisinet.tritech.com/index.php?option=com_k2&view=item&task=download&id=888> included on this e-mail.
Sincerely,
Shane Birch Technical Support Supervisor – 911/VisiNet | Decorah, IA TriTech Software Systems | www.tritech.com
Support Website: myvisinet.com <https://myvisinet.tritech.com>
